name: I Followed a Cat and Got Summoned to the Demon King's Castle
name_original: I Followed a Cat and Got Summoned to the Demon King's Castle
description:
Description

What happens when the Demon King grows bored of all of the "heroes" sent by the humans of his world? Well obviously the next logical step is to summon his own! Now all you can do is do your best to beat the Demon King!...with no weapon... or armor... or anything. This is seriously unfair! But you know you won't lose to him. 

I Followed a Cat and Got Summoned to the Demon King's Castle is an action platformer where you have to dodge and survive the Demon King's relentless attacks. Prove to him that you will be the one to beat him!

Created for the 2022 Anime Expo Chibi Game Jam.

Controls

[A] - left

[D] - left

Space - jump

Left Shift - sprint

Team

Angel Rubio - Programmer, Writer, Audio, Game Design

Alice Hua - Artist, Programmer, UI / UX, Game Design
